SIMBENCH

Collision simulator benchmark for robotics applications: RaiSim vs Bullet vs ODE vs MuJoCo vs DartSim

View on GitHub Download .zip Download .tar.gz

Simbench

Overview

Simbench is the project for benchmark of rigid body simulation with contacts.

The list of the simulators is as follows:

  • RaiSim by Jemin Hwangbo, Dongho Kang et al.
  • Bullet Physics by Erwin Coumans
  • Open Dynamics Engine by Russell Smith
  • Multi-Joint dynamics with Contact (a.k.a. MuJoCo) by Emanuel Todorov
  • DART Sim

Test results

  • Rolling test
  • Bouncing test
  • Thousand balls test
  • Tower test
  • ANYmal PD control test
  • ANYmal zero gravity test
  • ANYmal free drop test

Commentary

If you want to contribute the project or have any concerns, please contact to Dongho Kang.

simbench is maintained by eastskykang. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
